mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Bible Daily is dedicated to making the timeless wisdom of the Bible accessible to everyone through engaging stories and thoughtful interpretations. We believe that the Bible's teachings can provide guidance, comfort, and inspiration in our daily lives.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded with a passion for sharing biblical wisdom, Bible Daily has grown into a trusted resource for Bible stories and spiritual guidance. Our team of dedicated writers and editors work tirelessly to present biblical narratives in both English and Chinese, making these profound stories accessible to a wider audience.

offer.title: What We Offer
items: Daily Bible stories with modern interpretations

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.content: We believe in presenting Bible stories in a way that is both faithful to the original text and relevant to modern life. Our content is carefully crafted to:
items: Offer practical applications for daily life

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Our team consists of biblical scholars, experienced writers, and passionate educators who are committed to sharing the wisdom of the Bible. We work together to ensure that our content is both accurate and accessible.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.content: We invite you to join our growing community of readers and learners. Whether you're new to the Bible or a long-time student, Bible Daily offers resources to support your spiritual journey.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: We welcome your feedback, questions, and suggestions. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

what.a: Bible Daily is a platform dedicated to sharing Bible stories and promoting spiritual growth through daily readings, interpretations, and resources in both English and Chinese.

free.q: Is the content free to access?
free.a: Yes, all our basic content is free to access. We offer premium features for those who want to dive deeper into their Bible study journey.

frequency.q: How often is new content added?
frequency.a: We update our content daily with new Bible stories, reflections, and study materials. Our team works continuously to provide fresh and engaging content.

bilingual.q: Are the Bible stories available in both English and Chinese?
bilingual.a: Yes, we provide all our Bible stories and content in both English and Chinese to serve a wider audience and promote cross-cultural understanding.

accuracy.q: How accurate are the Bible translations?
accuracy.a: We use well-established Bible translations and work with biblical scholars to ensure accuracy in our content. We also provide context and explanations to help readers better understand the stories.
